title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories on the x axis representing Category Of Gdp, and Decrease in billion euros in each Category Of Gdp on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Total where Decrease in billion euros is 70.0.
The lowest category is found at Exports where Decrease in billion euros is 1.4.
The highest value at Total is almost 50.0 times larger than the minimum value of Exports.
The highest value at Total is almost 50.0 times larger than the minimum value of Exports.
The difference between the max Category Of Gdp Total and min Category Of Gdp Exports is 68.6.
